revision.text: Possibly: An introduction to, or a short discourse concerning, universal history. In two parts..., by Jacques Bénigne Bossuet. 2v. (London : printed by R. Reily; and sold by J. and J. Bonwicke, and S. Austen in St Paul's Churchyard; J. Hazard, near Stationer's Hall; and J. Newton, in Little Britain, 1729-30). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1421282~S1
